analyzed: mauliḥ jayati raviḥ gagana tilaka ekaḥ

original: TY_1.2ab/.mūrdhnā gaṇeśaṃ ca sarasvatīṃ ca salokapālaṃ parameśvaraṃ ca/
analyzed: gaṇeśam ca sarasvatīm ca sa lokapālam parameśvaram ca

original: TY_1.2cd/.padmodbhavaṃ padmadhanaṃ hariṃ ca trailokyadīpaṃ praṇamāmi bhānum//
analyzed: padma dhanam harim ca trailokya dīpam praṇamāmi bhānum
atas ūrdhvam vijigīṣoḥ vidita janma samayasya
horā rāśau sthāna bala parigrahe grahāṇām ca

original: TY_1.4cd/.āyuṣi ca parijñāte śubham aśubhaṃ vā phalaṃ vācyam//
analyzed: ca parijñāte śubham aśubham vā phalam vācyam
evam sthita viṣaye bhavati śāstra nirdeśaḥ

original: TY_1.5cd/.janmasamayaṃ ca kecid vadanti na vadanti bahuvo 'nye//
analyzed: ca kecid vadanti na vadanti bahuvaḥ nye

original: TY_1.6ab/.janmarkṣodayalagne tad api yayor vā yiyāsataḥ praśne/
analyzed: tat api yayoḥ vā yiyāsataḥ praśne

original: TY_1.7ab/.śatror horārāśis tad adhipatir janmabhaṃ tadīśo vā//
analyzed: horā rāśiḥ tat adhipatiḥ janma bham tad īśaḥ vā

original: TY_1.7cd/.yady aste hibuke vā tathāpi śatrur hato vācyaḥ//
analyzed: aste hibuke vā tathā api śatruḥ hataḥ vācyaḥ
manoramā bhūḥ maṅgalya dravya darśanam śastam

original: TY_1.8cd/.yadi cādareṇa pṛcchati daivajño nirdiśed vijayam//
analyzed: ca ādareṇa pṛcchati daivajñaḥ nirdiśet vijayam

original: TY_1.9ab/.nandā bhadrā vijayā riktā pūrṇā ca nāmasadṛśaphalāḥ/
analyzed: bhadrā vijayā riktā pūrṇā ca nāma sadṛśa phalāḥ

original: TY_1.9cd/.nyūnasameṣṭā daśame tithayaḥ śukle kṛṣṇe pratīpās tāḥ//
analyzed: daśame tithayaḥ śukle kṛṣṇe pratīpāḥ tāḥ
didhakṣoḥ anyatra arka udayāt śubhā āgneyī

original: TY_1.14cd/.pūrveṣu triṣu yāmye pitrye ca vihāya madhyaniśam//
analyzed: triṣu yāmye pitrye ca vihāya madhyaniśam

original: TY_1.15ab/.na niśāpaścimabhāge punarvasau triṣu ca vaiṣṇavādyeṣu/
analyzed: niśā paścima bhāge punarvasau triṣu ca vaiṣṇava ādyeṣu
pi śubhāḥ kālāḥ śravaṇa indravahasta puṣyeṣu

original: TY_1.16ab/.prācyādi sapta sapta kramena dhiṣṇyāni kṛttikādīni/
analyzed: sapta sapta kramena dhiṣṇyāni kṛttikā ādīni
eka tvam pūrva uttaraḥ roṇi tarayoḥ ca

original: TY_1.17cd/.ājñām iva kuliśabhṛtaḥ patanti na cireṇa te vyasane//
analyzed: iva kuliśa bhṛtaḥ patanti na cireṇa te vyasane

original: TY_1.19ab/.jyeṣṭhā prāgbhādrapadā rohiṇy athottarā ca phalgunyā/
analyzed: prāgbhādrapadā rohiṇī atha uttarā ca phalgunyā

original: TY_1.19cd/.śūlāni prācyādiṣu teṣu gato 'tyeti yadi citram//

analyzed: tu janma sampad vipad karā kṣemā
dhana nāśaḥ cāndre śakti kṣayaḥ nna hāniḥ ca
jaya dhana labdhiḥ śaukre strī vastra gandha dhana lābhāḥ
ca bandha rogān prāpnoti dine rkaputrasya

original: TY_2.3cd/.saumye 'py anupacayasthe na bhavati yātrā śubhā yātuḥ//E3
analyzed: pi an upacaya sthe na bhavati yātrā śubhā yātuṣe

original: TY_3.1cd/.garam api kaiś cic chastaṃ vaṇijā(jāṃ)

analyzed: pūṣā da kha antaka agni dhātāraḥ

original: TY_3.4ab/.ahnaḥ pañcadaśāṃśo rātreś caivaṃ muhūrta iti saṃjñā/
analyzed: pañcadaśa aṃśaḥ rātreḥ ca evam muhūrtaḥ iti saṃjñā

original: TY_3.4cd/.sa ca vijñeyas tajjñaiś chāyāyantrāmbubhir yuktyā//
analyzed: ca vijñeyaḥ tad jñaiḥ chāyāyantra ambubhiḥ yuktyā

original: TY_3.5ab/.nakṣatravat kṣaṇānāṃ parighādi tadīśvaraiḥ samaṃ cintyam/
analyzed: kṣaṇānām parigha ādi tad īśvaraiḥ samam cintyam

original: TY_3.5cd/.phalam api tad eva dṛṣṭaṃ gargādyais tatra ca ślokāḥ//
analyzed: api tat eva dṛṣṭam garga ādyaiḥ tatra ca ślokāḥ

original: TY_3.7ab/.yaś cāṣṭamo muhūrto viriñcināmābhijit sa nirdiṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: ca aṣṭamaḥ muhūrtaḥ viriñci nāmā abhijit sa nirdiṣṭaḥ

original: TY_3.8ab/.aṣṭamena divase same śubho yo viriñcivibhusaṃjñitāḥ(taḥ)(add.kṣaṇaḥ)/
analyzed: divase same śubhaḥ yaḥ viriñci vibhu saṃjñitāḥ taḥ ad lakṣaṇaḥ
śubhaḥ śaśī janma bhe pi yātrāyām

original: TY_4.3ab/.sitapakṣādau candre śubhe śubhaṃ pakṣam aśubham aśubhe ca/
analyzed: candre śubhe śubham pakṣam aśubham aśubhe ca
gocara śubha daḥ na śubham pakṣa kṣe

original: TY_5.1ab/.iṣṭaṃ svajanmalagnaṃ na janmarāśyudgamas tayoḥ sthānāt/
analyzed: sva janma lagnam na janma rāśi udgamaḥ tayoḥ sthānāt

original: TY_5.3ab/.āye janmani rāśiṣu yeṣu śubhā bhāskaradvitīyai//
analyzed: janmani rāśiṣu yeṣu śubhāḥ bhāskara dvitīyaiḥ
āpya lagna kāryam tu tat nava aṃśe
bhavati yiyāsoḥ śubha grahāṇām nava aṅga lagneṣu
phalam divasiḥ tat aśeṣam kāla horāyām
nidhana stham sarva ārambha ḍambha prayogeṣu
rahitā yātrā sā eva unmatta bhāminī
yā yātrā śīlena eva kula aṅganā

original: TY_7.1ab/.lagnopagataiḥ saumyair ārogyaṃ bhavati cittasaukhyañ ca/
analyzed: saumyaiḥ ārogyam bhavati citta saukhyam ca
artha cayaḥ yodha vivṛddhiḥ tṛtīya sthaiḥ

original: TY_7.2ab/.vāhanasuhṛdāṃ vṛddhiś caturthagaiḥ pañcagaiś ca mantribalam/
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ caturtha gaiḥ pañca gaiḥ ca mantri balam
ṣaṣṭha sthaiḥ bhṛgu varjam saptameṣu hitāḥ
dhane śaśi varjam navama bheṣu vasu sampad

original: TY_7.3cd/.karmaṇi siddhir lābho balasampātaś ca daśamādyaiḥ//
analyzed: siddhiḥ lābhaḥ bala sampātaḥ ca daśama ādyaiḥ
saptama gaiḥ sva viṣaya nāśaḥ bhṛgusute ca
nidhana upagataiḥ senā vyasanam mahat navama saṃsthaiḥ
ekādaśa saṃsthaiḥ krūraiḥ antya upagaiḥ sva bala bhedaḥ

original: TY_7.8ab/.krūro 'py anukūlasthaḥ śasto lagne śubho 'pi vāniṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: anukūla sthaḥ śastaḥ lagne vā aniṣṭaḥ

original: TY_7.8cd/.vakrī na śubhaḥ kendre tadahas tadvargalagnañ ca//
analyzed: na śubhaḥ kendre tad ahar tad varga lagnam ca
jīva sitau bhedasya tu rāhu ketu budha saurāḥ

original: TY_7.10cd/.sūryādibhir anukūlais tad udayavargaiś ca tatsiddhiḥ//
analyzed: anukūlaiḥ tat udaya vargaiḥ ca tad siddhiḥ
graha vijitāḥ ravi abhibhūtāḥ viraśmayaḥ hrasvāḥ

original: TY_7.11cd/.bhujagā iva mantrahatā bhavanty akāryakṣamā lagne//
analyzed: iva mantra hatāḥ bhavanti akārya kṣamāḥ lagne

original: TY_7.12ab/.yeṣāṃ game navamapañcamakaṇṭakasthāḥ saumyās trītīyaripulābhagatāś ca pāpāḥ/
analyzed: game navama pañcama kaṇṭaka sthāḥ saumyāḥ trītīya ripu lābha gatāḥ ca pāpāḥ

original: TY_7.12cd/.āyānti te svabhavanāni punaḥ kṛtārthāḥ dattā dvijātiṣu tathā vidhivad yathārthāḥ//
analyzed: te sva bhavanāni punar kṛtārthāḥ dattāḥ dvijātiṣu tathā vidhivat yathārthāḥ

original: TY_7.13ab/.ekasminn api kendre yadi saumyo na graho 'sti yātrāyām/
analyzed: api kendre yadi saumyaḥ na yātrāyām

original: TY_7.13cd/.janmany atha vā karmaṇi na tac chubhaṃ prāhur ācāryāḥ//
analyzed: atha vā karmaṇi na tat śubham prāhuḥ ācāryāḥ

original: TY_7.15ab/.yāyibhir anukūlasthair yānaṃ paurair vigṛhya cāsīnam/
analyzed: anukūla sthaiḥ yānam pauraiḥ vigṛhya ca āsīnam

original: TY_7.15cd/.pauretarair api śubhair yāyād ardhena sainyasya//
TY_7.16ab/.sarvair apy aśubhakaraiḥ śubhadaivaṃ saṃśrayet pradhānanṛpam/
analyzed: api aśubha karaiḥ śubha daivam saṃśrayet pradhāna nṛpam

original: TY_7.16cd/.balasiddhiḥ saumyaphalair balibhiḥ krūrair jayo yuddhe//E16

analyzed: jayāya yāyāt viparyaye kleśa bhaṅga vadhāḥ

original: TY_8.2ab/.udito yato yataś ca bhramaṇe yadvārabheṣu cāragate/
analyzed: yatas yatas ca bhramaṇe cāra gate

original: TY_8.3ab/.na pratiśukre siddhiṃ svalpo 'py arthaḥ prayāti yātṛṇām/
analyzed: pratiśukre siddhim su alpaḥ pi arthaḥ prayāti yātṛṇām

original: TY_8.3cd/.kāmaṃ vrajet pratibhṛguṃ jijīviṣur nāstage śukre//
analyzed: vrajet pratibhṛgum jijīviṣuḥ na asta ge śukre

original: TY_8.4ab/.kaluṣi vapuṣi grahahate pratilome nīcage 'stage ca bhṛgau/
analyzed: vapuṣi graha hate pratilome nīca ge sta ge ca bhṛgau

original: TY_8.4cd/.balasaṃpanno 'pi nṛpo yātā śatror vaśaṃ yāti//
analyzed: pi nṛpaḥ yātā śatroḥ vaśam yāti

original: yas tathaiva karaṇaṃ vāras tathā gocaraṃ
analyzed: yaḥ tathā eva karaṇam vāraḥ tathā gocaram

original: TY_.add8.2c/.[ye cānye śakunādayo nigaditāḥ sarve 'pi te śobhanā
analyzed: ca anye śakuna ādayaḥ nigaditāḥ sarve te śobhanā
sya na tadā śakuraḥ u pi jīvet daṅgataḥ
pi yāyāt yadi śukre candrajaḥ nu kūla sthaḥ

original: TY_8.6ab/.yo 'pi patir diśi yasyāṃ tasmin tatsthe na tāṃ diśaṃ yāyāt/
analyzed: pi patiḥ diśi yasyām tasmin tad sthe na tām diśam yāyāt

original: TY_9.2ab/.hutvānalaṃ namaskṛtya devatāḥ svasti vācya viprāṃś ca/
analyzed: namaskṛtya devatāḥ svasti vācya viprān ca

original: TY_9.2cd/.dhyāyan digīśam avilambitaṃ vrajed bhūpatiḥ sumanāḥ//
analyzed: digīśam avilambitam vrajet bhūpatiḥ su manāḥ

original: TY_9.3ab/.kāryavaśāt svayam agamaṃ bhūbhartuḥ kecid āhur ācāryāḥ/
analyzed: svayam agamam bhūbhartuḥ kecid āhuḥ ācāryāḥ

original: TY_9.5ab/.dakṣiṇapārśvaspandanam iṣṭaṃ hṛdayaṃ vihāya pṛṣṭhaṃ ca/
TY_9.5cd/.manasaś cāgamaśuddhiḥ ślokaś cāyaṃ munibhir uktaḥ//
analyzed: ca āgama śuddhiḥ ślokaḥ ca ayam munibhiḥ uktaḥ

original: TY_9.6cd/.ekataś ca mano yāti tad viśuddhaṃ jayāvaham//
analyzed: ca manaḥ yāti tat viśuddham jaya āvaham

original: TY_9.7ab/.ārohati kṣitipatau vinayopapanno yātrānugo 'nyaturagaṃ pratiheṣitaś ca/
analyzed: kṣitipatau vinaya upapannaḥ yātrā anugaḥ nyaturagam pratiheṣitaḥ ca

original: TY_9.7cd/.vaktreṇa vā spṛśati dakṣiṇam ātmapārśvaṃ yo 'śvaḥ sa bhartur acirāt pracinoti lakṣmīm//
analyzed: vā spṛśati dakṣiṇam ātma pārśvam śvas sa bhartuḥ acirāt pracinoti lakṣmīm

original: TY_9.8ab/.muhurmuhur mūtraśakṛt karoti na tāḍyamāno 'py anulomayāyī/
analyzed: mūtra śakṛt karoti na tāḍyamānaḥ pi anuloma yāyī

original: TY_9.8cd/.akāryabhīto 'śruvilocanaś ca śivaṃ na bhartus turago 'bhidhatte//
analyzed: śru vilocanaḥ ca śivam na bhartuḥ turagaḥ bhidhatte

original: TY_9.9ab/.skhalitagatir akasmāt trastakarṇo 'tidīnaḥ śvasati mṛdu sudīrghaṃ nyastahastaḥ pṛthivyām/
analyzed: akasmāt trasta karṇaḥ ti dīnaḥ śvasati mṛdu su dīrgham nyasta hastaḥ pṛthivyām

original: TY_9.9cd/.drutamukulitadṛṣṭiḥ svapnaśīlo vikomo bhayakṛd ahitabhakṣī naikaśo 'sṛkśakṛtkṛt//
analyzed: svapna śīlaḥ bhaya kṛt ahita bhakṣī na ekaśas sṛj śakṛt kṛt

original: TY_9.10b/.yāyād yātrānulomaṃ tvaritapadagatir vaktram unnamya coccaiḥ/
analyzed: yātrā anulomam tvarita pada gatiḥ vaktram unnamya ca uccais

original: TY_9.10d/.tatkālaṃ vā madāptau jayakṛd atha radaṃ veṣṭayan dakṣiṇaṃ ca//
analyzed: vā mada āptau jaya kṛt atha radam veṣṭayan dakṣiṇam ca
baddha eka paśu āmiṣa pūrṇa kumbhāḥ
mīnāḥ dvija gaṇikā āpta janāḥ ca cāru veṣāḥ

original: TY_9.14ab/.svayam atha racitāny ayatnato vā yadi kathitāni bhavanti maṅgalāni/
analyzed: atha racitāni ayatnataḥ vā yadi kathitāni bhavanti maṅgalāni

original: TY_9.14cd/.sa jayati sakalāṃ tato dharitrīṃ grahaṇadṛgālabhanaśrutair upāsya//
analyzed: jayati sakalām tatas dharitrīm grahaṇa dṛś ālabhana śrutaiḥ upāsya
surabhi su veṣa janam bhajet ca mārgam

original: TY_9.17cd/.svapneṣv api tāni śubhāśubhāni viḍlepanaṃ dhanyam//
analyzed: api tāni śubha aśubhāni viṣ lepanam dhanyam
na śubha dam anyatra śastaṃsta phalam
ruru śyenāḥ ca dakṣiṇa aṅga lacuna
iṣṭam cāṣaka śaśa godhā ahi sūkara godhā sūkara ahi jātīnām

original: TY_9.23ab/.mṛgavihagā śasyante pradakṣiṇaṃ viṣamasaṃkhyayā ca mṛgāḥ/
analyzed: śasyante pradakṣiṇam viṣama saṃkhyayā ca mṛgāḥ
sahāyaḥ vyasanī kṛtaghnaḥ sthiti prabhettā kara śīrṇa rāṣṭraḥ

original: TY_9.26ab/.ato viparyastaguṇena rājñā tādṛgvidho 'ris tv abhiyuktamātraḥ/
analyzed: viparyasta guṇena rājñā tādṛgvidhaḥ riḥ tu abhiyukta mātraḥ

original: TY_9.26cd/.tarur ghuṇair jagdha ivāttakāryo mahān api kṣipram upaiti bhaṅgāḥ(ṅgam)//
analyzed: ghuṇaiḥ jagdhaḥ iva ātta kāryaḥ mahān api kṣipram upaiti
śauryāḥ vara vāraṇa aśva yodha mukhāḥ khyāḥ
yātā śoka ārttā ripu balam āśuḥ yā āyāti
su alpaḥ pi pravara balam nihanti rājā
hanyāt śatroḥ an iṣṭa graha diṭ iṅ ni
reṣu lagneṣu ca kūṭa āyudhaḥ kūṭa yuddham

original: TY_9.30cd/.āgantunāśāya bahirmukhās te tulyaṃ vihaṅgaiḥ saramātmajau(jā)ś ca//
analyzed: bahirmukhāḥ te tulyam vihaṅgaiḥ saramātmaja ojāḥ ca

original: TY_9.31b/.sūryendvoḥ pariveṣakhaṇḍam athavā dṛśyeta yasyāṃ diśi/
analyzed: pariveṣa khaṇḍam athavā dṛśyeta yasyām diśi

original: TY_9.31d/.sainye vāpi yato viśanti hi tataḥ śatro(troḥ)
analyzed: vā api yatas viśanti hi tatas śatrotroḥ
yā ucchittiḥ sāla pātaḥ ca kāryaḥ
vā putreṇa indoḥ vīkṣite gniḥ pradeyaḥ
śma vṛṣṭi pātaiḥ nirghāta kṣiticalana ādi vaikṛtaiḥ ca

original: TY_9.34cd/.yuddhānte mṛgaśakunaiś ca dīptanādaiḥ no bhadraṃ bhavati jite pari('pi)
analyzed: mṛga śakunaiḥ ca dīpta nādaiḥ naḥ bhadram bhavati jite paripi

original: TY_9.35d/.tadā sukham akaṇṭakaṃ nṛpatir atti deśe ripuḥ(ripoḥ)//E35
